# PDF Viewer

This Constellation DX component renders a PDF from a URL or base64 source and overlays highlights provided via a configured parent property (typically `pxResults` from an AI/insights result or an attachments mapping).

Props
- `value` — PDF source (URL or base64 data URL)
- `highlightParentProp` — clipboard property to read highlight metadata (pxResults array expected)
- `searchProperty` — optional clipboard property to trigger searches
- `height` — height of the viewer (e.g., `600px`)
- `debug` — enable debug logging

Integration notes
- Use `actions.triggerFieldChange(prop, value)` to notify Constellation of highlight/selection changes.
- The component exposes `window.simplePdfViewer.search(text)` for quick programmatic search triggers.
